snippet: Apple has made its first attempt to quantify how many American jobs can be credited to the sale of its products, Nick Wingfield reports in Monday's Times. The total includes the Apple engineers who design the devices and the drivers who deliver them...
abstract: Apple has made its first attempt to quantify how many American jobs can be credited to the sale of its products, Nick Wingfield reports in Monday's Times. The total includes the Apple engineers who design the devices and the drivers who deliver them - even the people who build the trucks that get them there.

headline.main: Daily Report: How Many Jobs Has Apple Created?
